name: ComboboxItem
description:
An individual item in the list.
Renders a `<div>` element.

value.description: A unique value that identifies this item.

onClick.description:
An optional click handler for the item when selected.
It fires when clicking the item with the pointer, as well as when pressing `Enter` with the keyboard if the item is highlighted when the `Input` or `List` element has focus.

index.description: The index of the item in the list. Improves performance when specified by avoiding the need to calculate the index automatically from the DOM.

nativeButton.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `true` if the rendered element is a native button.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

style.detailedType:
| React.CSSProperties
| ((
    state: Combobox.Item.State,
  ) => CSSProperties | undefined)
| undefined

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Combobox.Item.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-selected.description: Present when the item is selected.

data-highlighted.description: Present when the item is highlighted.

data-disabled.description: Present when the item is disabled.
